DOC.brief_summary: This study measure effect various dos LY2409021 blood sugar level amount glucose release liver , glucagon give increase . Each participant may receive 2 single dos LY2409021 2 different study period , minimum 13-day washout dose period . This study approximately 9 week long , include screening . A screening appointment require within 6 week prior start study .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect LY2409021 Blood Sugar Levels When Glucagon Levels Are Increased Healthy Male Participants
DOC.criteria: Must healthy male Have screen body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m^2 inclusive Have fast blood glucose 3.06.0 millimoles/liter ( mmol/L ) ( inclusive ) screening Are allergic LY2409021 , insulin , glucagon , somatostatin , similar drug Have regular alcohol intake great 21 units/week , unwilling stop alcohol require study restriction ( 1 unit = 360 mL beer , 150 mL wine , 45 mL spirit ) Are currently smoker use tobacco product regular basis 6 month prior screen Have receive medication know affect glucose metabolism 1 month study Have significant blood disorder and/or donate blood ( 450 mL ) last 3 month
